page.page_body:
During the past months, our laboratory published two newsletters in the 'ELTRUN eBusiness newsletter' series. The newsletter are distributed by email; contact us to subscribe. From this page you can access these in a pdf format.
Extracting Value from Intellectual Capital: An Information Science Perspective with the following contents:
Information and Intellectual Capital
Giving value to information: an information science perspective
Extracting and aggregating value from information: an organisational perspective
eClassify: towards an integrated information architecture
Expected contribution and related work
Implementing the Learner-Centered Design Paradigm for Web-Based Training Curricula with the following contents:
Introduction and background information
Learner-centered design of web-based training courses
Plan the human (learner) centered design process
Understand and specify the context of use
Specify the user and organizational requirements
Design
Evaluation
Conclusions
Managerial Implications of Networking: Impact on people and technology with the following contents:
The DOMINO Project
Method of work and research contexts
Interorganizational networks
Characteristics of interorganizational networks
Generic network types
Notion of network management
Management challenges
The DOMINO management framework
Towards implications for managerial action
